title: Energy use: fossil fuels by fuel type and industry

editions.title: Energy use: fossil fuels by fuel type and industry
editions.summary: The UK's fuel use by industry (SIC 2007 group - around 130 categories) and type (coal, natural gas, petrol, diesel oil for road vehicles (DERV), fuel oil, gas oil, aviation fuel and other), 1990 to 2021. The dataset excludes biofuels and waste.
editions.description: The UK's fuel use by industry (SIC 2007 group - around 130 categories) and type (coal, natural gas, petrol, diesel oil for road vehicles (DERV), fuel oil, gas oil, aviation fuel and other), 1990 to 2021. The dataset excludes biofuels and waste.
editions.creator: office-for-national-statistics

columns.name: year
columns.description: The time period associated with the observation.

columns.name: section_notation
columns.description: The standard industrial classification code related to the industry section name.

columns.name: industry_section_name
columns.description: The industry section name that resulted to energy consumption.

columns.name: fuel
columns.description: The fuel type consumed by the SIC.

columns.name: measure
columns.description: Measure type asscoiated with the observation values.

columns.name: unit
columns.titles: Millions of tonnes of oil equivalent
columns.description: Unit of measure of energy consumption.
